plot outline: Rakesh, a bank employee visits a town to inspect a hotel, where he meets his close friend Kalyan. Rakesh and Kalyan get drunk and end up in a police station. They learn that they are accused of murdering the hotel owner. Keerthi, Rakesh's love, convinces her uncle Maarthandam, whom she assumes a great lawyer. However, Maarthandam has never gone to the court. Will Rakesh and Kalyan be saved?
title: My Dear Marthandam
